html: There is no valid reason for the #TransMilitaryBan. This dangerous policy will affect 14,700 troops. We know that: There is no logical medical or military rationale for the ban Reinstating the ban will harm military readiness and morale
text:
There is no valid reason for the #TransMilitaryBan. This dangerous policy will affect 14,700 troops. We know that:

 There is no logical medical or military rationale for the ban
 Reinstating the ban will harm military readiness and morale

html: This is not just an LGBTQ issue or a military issue. This is a human rights issue. Last month I proudly voted for HRes 124 to oppose and lift the #TransMilitaryBan. Today the ban goes into effect but we will continue to #FightTheBan and #ProtectTransTroops.pic.twitter.com/GbysUpIOnq
text: This is not just an LGBTQ issue or a military issue. This is a human rights issue. Last month I proudly voted for HRes 124 to oppose and lift the #TransMilitaryBan. Today the ban goes into effect but we will continue to #FightTheBan and #ProtectTransTroops.pic.twitter.com/GbysUpIOnq

html: For African American women and Latinas the #paygap is even larger. African American women on average earn only 61 cents and Latinas on average earn only 53 cents for every dollar earned by white, non-Hispanic men. #EqualPay
text: For African American women and Latinas the #paygap is even larger.  African American women on average earn only 61 cents and Latinas on average earn only 53 cents for every dollar earned by white, non-Hispanic men. #EqualPay

html: On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts. For women of color, the #wagegap is much larger. #EqualPay
text: On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts.  For women of color, the #wagegap is much larger.  #EqualPay

html: The #PaycheckFairnessAct would help close the #wagegap by giving workers stronger tools to combat wage discrimination. #EqualPayDay

html: Minority communities deserve equal representation as we discuss #environmentaljustice solutions.
text: Minority communities deserve equal representation as we discuss #environmentaljustice solutions.

html: I have worked hard to ensure that we have more voices of color as we discuss energy and environment issues. That is why I co-founded the United for Climate and Environmental Justice Task Force.
text: I have worked hard to ensure that we have more voices of color as we discuss energy and environment issues. That is why I co-founded the United for Climate and Environmental Justice Task Force.

html: The fact is that communities of color are disproportionately impacted by environmental injustices that can harm their public health and economic livelihoods. Having voices from these communities at the table is critical.
text: The fact is that communities of color are disproportionately impacted by environmental injustices that can harm their public health and economic livelihoods. Having voices from these communities at the table is critical.

html: We've been asked: "how big is #Florence?" Hard thing to quantify, but here are some numbers... *Area of Tropical Storm force winds currently 300 miles wide *Storm Surge Watches/Warnings stretch along 450 miles of coastline *More than 5" of rain expected in a 570 mile-long swathpic.twitter.com/9V772jQfGx
text:
We've been asked: "how big is #Florence?" Hard thing to quantify, but here are some numbers...
*Area of Tropical Storm force winds currently 300 miles wide
*Storm Surge Watches/Warnings stretch along 450 miles of coastline
*More than 5" of rain expected in a 570 mile-long swathpic.twitter.com/9V772jQfGx

html: Seventeen years later, we are grateful that we have not been victimized in such a major attack again but the threat of terrorism, domestic and foreign, still looms & we must be vigilant. My heart goes out to all families grieving the loss of their innocent loved ones.
text: Seventeen years later, we are grateful that we have not been victimized in such a major attack again but the threat of terrorism, domestic and foreign, still looms & we must be vigilant. My heart goes out to all families grieving the loss of their innocent loved ones.

html: In 2001, terrorists caused thousands of innocent Americans to lose their lives when they struck the Twin Towers & the Pentagon. As one who sat riveted in front of the TV that day, alternately furious, shocked and despondent, like many, I knew our country would never be the same.

html: Though the forecast can change, now is the time to proactively prepare for the flooding that could severely impact our community with this now-Category 4 Hurricane. Fill your car with gas, buy bottled water, stock-up with extra batteries, and power-up your electronic devices.

html: On the House Floor, we held a moment of silence for my dear friend and mentor, Congressman Ron Dellums. The impact that he had on this chamber cannot be overstated. He built bridges and he blazed trails. I will miss his wisdom, his humor, and his deep compassion.pic.twitter.com/mZE6csAe2g
text:
On the House Floor, we held a moment of silence for my dear friend and mentor, Congressman Ron Dellums. 

The impact that he had on this chamber cannot be overstated. He built bridges and he blazed trails. I will miss his wisdom, his humor, and his deep compassion.pic.twitter.com/mZE6csAe2g
